ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Overthere to Oasis
ygData.msgSnippet: You lose Dark Elf form everytime you zone -- and I am not sure you can cast it on a boat (Enchanters can t cast illusions. If it considers that a spell...)
ygData.messageBody:
You lose Dark Elf form everytime you zone -- and I am not sure you can
cast it on a boat (Enchanters can't cast illusions. If it considers that
a spell...)

AND< if your deity is other than Agnostic, then they'll see through the
illusion
anyway.

AND if you've been fighting in Venril Sethir, even if you're Agnostic,
forget it.

If you're lower level, be careful of spectres attacking you on the raft in
oasis


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Peck White [mailto:pwhite@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 11:54 AM

>How hard is it for a bard to get onto the boat from Overthere to Oasis
>without getting killed? Does the Mask of Deception help?
>
>At some point I need to get to HHK to get the Aria.
>
>Thanks,
>
>Tomerrilin
